name: Park Up - Car
description:
Park Up Car is a challenging game that will push your nerves to the limit as you climb tracks and platforms with a car to reach the top. With practice, you'll master the art of parkour, jumping and drifting while navigating through different environments. Confront rain, tornadoes, slippery floors, dragons, daring leaps, and a few more surprises on your way to the summit.

A tribute to "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy" and "Golfing Over It with Alva Majo."

  • Accelerate, jump, fall, climb, drift, fall again.
  • Switch between 5 karts and 5 motorcycles.
  • Climb higher than ever before.
  • Fall once more.
  • Perhaps after 2 hours or 100 hours, you'll reach the summit.
  • You'll be amazed.

Warning: Painfully fun.
